FieldSet.description:
Any fields here will only show up if "Use Existing Bill-to Client ID" is unchecked. 2-Columns.
Note the following is in Apex Code: * The Bill-to First/Last Name, Address 1, City, State, Postal Code, and Country fields are pre-populated from the Opportunity's 'Agreement Signer' or 'Primary' Contact, so they should always have data even if Sales did not put any in or it's not on the layout * The same information (except First/Last Name) is also used during a validation procedure * The fields in this Field Set, and the Address-related fields from above, are cleared if "Use Existing Bill-To Client ID" is checked
FieldSet.label: Section 1: Bill-to (person)
